message.content:
1. Fifty-four patients were scheduled for elective surgery.
2. These patients were randomly allocated to two groups.
3. Each group consisted of 27 patients.
4. One group received hypertonic saline 5%.
5. The dosage for hypertonic saline 5% was 2.3 ml/kg.
6. The other group received normal saline.
7. The dosage for normal saline was 13 ml/kg.

messages.content:
Statement: Fifty-four patients who scheduled for elective surgery were randomly allocated to two groups of 27 patients who received hypertonic saline 5% (2.3 ml/kg) or received normal saline (13 ml/kg).

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
